title: 94/393/EC: Commission Decision of 8 July 1994 on certain protective measures with respect to bivalve molluscs, marine gastropods and echinoderms from Turkey
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 July 1994 on certain protective measures with respect to bivalve molluscs, marine gastropods and echinoderms from Turkey (94/393/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall prohibit the importation of consignments of bivalve molluscs, marine gastropods and echinoderms originating in Turkey.
Member States shall amend the measures which they apply to importation in order to bring them into conformity with the present Decision. They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision shall apply until 30 October 1994.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 July 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
